articles.title: Asian shares gain, while oil prices jump as Trump orders a blockade of oil tankers to Venezuela
articles.description: Asian shares have advanced as strong buying of technology shares helped lift some benchmarks, while oil prices surged more than 1% after President Donald
articles.content:
Asian shares have advanced as strong buying of technology shares helped lift some benchmarks, while oil prices surged more than 1% after President Donald Trump ordered a blockade of all “sanctioned oil tankers” into Venezuela

articles.title: Hyundai and Kia will repair millions of vehicles under a deal to fix anti-theft technology
articles.description: Automakers Hyundai and Kia must offer free repairs to millions of models under a settlement announced Tuesday by Minnesota's attorney general, who led an effort by dozens of states that argued the vehicles weren't equipped with proper anti-theft technology, leaving them vulnerable to thefts
articles.content: Automakers Hyundai and Kia must offer free repairs to millions of models under a settlement announced Tuesday by Minnesota's attorney general, who led an effort by dozens of states that argued the vehicles weren't equipped with proper anti-theft tech... [2606 chars]

articles.title: This 10-bagger drone technology company has just won a lucrative new defence contract
articles.description: Elsight has won a major new contract, pushing the drone technology company's shares beyond 10-bagger territory.
articles.content:
Shares in Elsight Ltd (ASX: ELS) were trading higher on Wednesday after the company, which has increased in value 10-fold over the past year, said it had won new contracts worth more than US$20 million.
The company said in a statement to the ASX on W... [2731 chars]

articles.title: Ponzi schemes and financial bubbles: lessons from history
articles.description: Technology bubbles have often concealed major frauds. From the railway boom to the Madoff affair, are there warning signs at the heart of the current AI frenzy?
articles.content: Many investors are asking themselves if we are living in an AI bubble; others have gone beyond that and are simply asking themselves, until when? Yet the bubble keeps growing, fuelled by that perilous sentiment of “fear of missing out”. History and r... [6298 chars]

articles.title: 74 pc of Indian business leaders choose AI as top tech adoption
articles.description: around 74 per cent of corporate leaders in india ranked artificial intelligence (ai) among their top three technology adoption choices, a report said on tuesday. the report from standard chartered bank said that ai was followed by cloud computing at 64 per cent and digital assets at 46 per cent as next top choices. on a global scale, approximately seven in 10 corporate leaders are focusing on building strong foundational systems of emerging technologies in the short to medium term — notably cloud computing.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI :
AROUND 74 per cent of corporate leaders in India ranked artificial intelligence (AI) among their top three technology adoption choices, a report said on Tuesday. The report from Standard Chartered bank said that AI was followed by cloud c... [1824 chars]

articles.title: School shootings dropped in 2025 - but schools are still focusing too much on safety technology instead of prevention
articles.description: Prevention methods like lockdown drills do not account for many scenarios, including the likely case that a school shooter is a former or current student.
articles.content:
Active shootings represent a very small percentage of on-campus university violence.
But among those that do happen, there are patterns. And as law enforcement officials continue to investigate the Dec. 13, 2025, Brown University shooting, similariti... [6756 chars]

articles.title: MIT professor Nuno F.G. Loureiro shot at Brookline home in Massachusetts
articles.description: A professor at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology was fatally shot at his home near Boston, and authorities said Tuesday they had launched a homicide investigation.
articles.content:
A professor at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology was fatally shot at his home near Boston, and authorities said Tuesday they had launched a homicide investigation.
Nuno F.G. Loureiro, a 47-year-old physicist and fusion scientist, was shot Mon... [2158 chars]

articles.title: USI Invests in Optical Transceiver Manufacturing Capacity and Launches the Expansion Plan for the Second Plant in Vietnam
articles.description: SHANGHAI, Dec. 17, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Global investment in computing infrastructure is accelerating, driving technology upgrades and service innovation across the artificial intelligence industry and its supply chain. Since the beginning of the year, USI has actively expanded its data center business, focusing on server boards, including AI accelerator cards and server motherboards, optical communications such as optical engines and optical transceivers, and AI server power solutions, including power distribution units, while accelerating product and capacity development.
articles.content: SHANGHAI, Dec. 17, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Global investment in computing infrastructure is accelerating, driving technology upgrades and service innovation across the artificial intelligence industry and its supply chain. Since the beginning of the yea... [3754 chars]

articles.title: Tesla Faces California Sales Halt Unless It Alters Marketing
articles.description: Tesla Inc.’s sales in California are poised to be suspended for 30 days if it doesn’t change its marketing practices that allegedly mislead consumers about its driver-assistance technology, the state’s motor vehicles department said.
articles.content:
Tesla Inc.’s sales in California are poised to be suspended for 30 days if it doesn’t change its marketing practices that allegedly mislead consumers about its driver-assistance technology, the state’s motor vehicles department said.
The agency said ... [343 chars]
